message: Let's make this quick. 900,000 for me and 100,000 for you.  Every round costs us money.
I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out. 70/30 split?
The clock is ticking, Bob.  My last offer was more than fair.  This is my final offer - 75/25.
Time is money, Alice, and we're both losing out.  60/40 is my final offer.
